metadata.name: Cohort Analysis & Retention
metadata.description: Analyze customer cohorts to understand retention and lifetime value

task.instructions: # Cohort Analysis & Retention Track customer cohorts to understand retention patterns and predict LTV. ## Cohort Types - Acquisition cohorts (grouped by signup month) - Behavior cohorts (grouped by first action) - Channel cohorts (grouped by acquisition source) ## Analysis 1. Define cohort groups 2. Track retention by cohort over time 3. Calculate LTV by cohort 4. Compare cohort quality over time 5. Identify retention improvement opportunities ## Key Metrics - Month 1, 3, 6, 12 retention rates - Cohort LTV curves - Time to payback by cohort
